sentences.title: FIFA World Cup
sentences.sentence_text: The FIFA World Cup, often called the World Cup, is an international association football competition among the senior men's national teams of the members of the Fédération Internationale de Football Association (FIFA), the sport's global governing body.

sentences.title: FIFA World Cup
sentences.sentence_text: The tournament has been held every four years since the inaugural tournament in 1930, with the exception of 1942 and 1946 due to the Second World War.

sentences.title: FIFA World Cup
sentences.sentence_text: The reigning champions are Argentina, who won their third title at the 2022 World Cup by defeating France.

sentences.title: 2026 FIFA World Cup
sentences.sentence_text: The 2026 FIFA World Cup, marketed as FIFA World Cup 26, will be the 23rd FIFA World Cup, the quadrennial international men's soccer championship contested by the national teams of the member associations of FIFA.

sentences.title: 2026 FIFA World Cup
sentences.sentence_text: The tournament will take place from June 11 to July 19, 2026.

sentences.title: 2026 FIFA World Cup
sentences.sentence_text: It will be jointly hosted by sixteen cities—eleven in the United States, three in Mexico, and two in Canada.

sentences.title: 2026 FIFA World Cup
sentences.sentence_text: The tournament will be the first to be hosted by three nations.

sentences.title: List of FIFA World Cup finals
sentences.sentence_text: The FIFA World Cup is an international association football competition contested by the senior men's national teams of the Fédération Internationale de Football Association (FIFA), the sport's global governing body.

sentences.title: List of FIFA World Cup finals
sentences.sentence_text: The championship has been awarded every four years since 1930, except in 1942 and 1946, when it was not held because of World War II.

sentences.title: 2022 FIFA World Cup
sentences.sentence_text: The 2022 FIFA World Cup was the 22nd FIFA World Cup, the quadrennial world championship for national football teams organised by FIFA.

sentences.title: 2022 FIFA World Cup
sentences.sentence_text: It took place in Qatar from 20 November to 18 December 2022, after the country was awarded the hosting rights in 2010.

sentences.title: 2022 FIFA World Cup
sentences.sentence_text: It was the first World Cup to be held in the Middle East and the Arabian Peninsula, and the second in an Asian country after the 2002 tournament in South Korea and Japan.

sentences.title: 2018 FIFA World Cup
sentences.sentence_text: The 2018 FIFA World Cup was the 21st FIFA World Cup, the quadrennial world championship for national football teams organised by FIFA.

sentences.title: 2018 FIFA World Cup
sentences.sentence_text: It took place in Russia from 14 June to 15 July 2018, after the country was awarded the hosting rights in late 2010.

sentences.title: 2018 FIFA World Cup
sentences.sentence_text: It was the eleventh time the championships had been held in Europe and the first time they were held in Eastern Europe, also featuring one or two venues, depending on definition, located across the boundary with Asia.

sentences.title: 2018 FIFA World Cup
sentences.sentence_text: At an estimated cost of over $14.2 billion, it was the most expensive World Cup ever held until it was surpassed by the 2022 World Cup in Qatar.

sentences.title: 2014 FIFA World Cup
sentences.sentence_text: The 2014 FIFA World Cup was the 20th FIFA World Cup, the quadrennial world championship for men's national football teams organised by FIFA.

sentences.title: 2014 FIFA World Cup
sentences.sentence_text: It took place in Brazil from 12 June to 13 July 2014, after the country was awarded the hosting rights in 2007.

sentences.title: 2014 FIFA World Cup
sentences.sentence_text: It was the second time that Brazil staged the competition, the first being in 1950, and the fifth time that it was held in South America.

sentences.title: 2030 FIFA World Cup
sentences.sentence_text: The 2030 FIFA World Cup will be the 24th FIFA World Cup, a quadrennial international football tournament contested by the men's national teams of the member associations of FIFA.

sentences.title: 2026 FIFA World Cup qualification
sentences.sentence_text: The 2026 FIFA World Cup qualification will decide the 45 teams that will join hosts Canada, Mexico, and the United States at the 2026 FIFA World Cup.

sentences.title: 2006 FIFA World Cup
sentences.sentence_text: The 2006 FIFA World Cup was the 18th FIFA World Cup, the quadrennial international football world championship tournament.

sentences.title: 2006 FIFA World Cup
sentences.sentence_text: It was held from 9 June to 9 July 2006 in Germany, which had won the right to host the event in July 2000.

sentences.title: 2006 FIFA World Cup
sentences.sentence_text: Teams representing 198 national football associations from all six populated continents participated in the qualification process which began in September 2003.

sentences.title: 2006 FIFA World Cup
sentences.sentence_text: Thirty-one teams qualified from this process along with hosts Germany for the finals tournament.

sentences.title: 2006 FIFA World Cup
sentences.sentence_text: It was the second time that Germany staged the competition and the first as a unified country along with the former East Germany with Leipzig as a host city, and the 10th time that the tournament was held in Europe.

sentences.title: 2025 FIFA Club World Cup
sentences.sentence_text: The 2025 FIFA Club World Cup, also marketed as FIFA Club World Cup 25, was the first of the expanded FIFA Club World Cup, an international club soccer competition organized by FIFA.

sentences.title: 2025 FIFA Club World Cup
sentences.sentence_text: The tournament was held in the United States from June 14 to July 13, 2025, and featured 32 teams.

sentences.title: 2025 FIFA Club World Cup
sentences.sentence_text: The expanded format included the continental champions from the past four years as well as additional qualified teams.

sentences.title: 2025 FIFA Club World Cup
sentences.sentence_text: Chelsea won the tournament, defeating Paris Saint-Germain 3–0 in the final and becoming the inaugural world champions under the expanded format.

sentences.title: A match you'll never see: Messi plays football with Maneklal during Vantara visit
sentences.sentence_text: Legendary Argentine forward Lionel Messi was captured playing football with a baby elephant named Maneklal as he visited Vantara, a wildlife rescue and conservation centre founded by Anant Ambani in Gujarat's Jamnagar.

sentences.title: Watch: Messi performs puja with Anant Ambani during his Vantara visit
sentences.sentence_text: Videos showing Lionel Messi performing puja and participating in Hindu rituals have circulated widely online.

sentences.title: Sandesh Jhingan On India’s Football Fan Divide Amid Lionel Messi's GOAT Tour
sentences.sentence_text: Sandesh Jhingan raised doubts regarding the football culture in India, stating that the fans are crazy about the game but tend to overlook the local players' talents too often.

sentences.title: Sandesh Jhingan On India’s Football Fan Divide Amid Lionel Messi's GOAT Tour
sentences.sentence_text: According to him, the enormous publicity of Lionel Messi visit is a clear indication of the shortage of steady support for Indian footballers.

sentences.title: After missing out on Messi moment in Kolkata, teen plays with icon in Hyderabad
sentences.sentence_text: A 17-year-old fan, Vedang Sharma, who missed Lionel Messi's Kolkata appearance, unexpectedly played alongside his idol in Hyderabad.

sentences.sentence_text: Messi's visit to Vantara was part of his India tour, which included stops in Kolkata, Hyderabad, Mumbai and Delhi

sentences.title: Sandesh Jhingan Hopes Lionel Messi’s GOAT Tour Sparks Discussions Around India's Domestic Structure
sentences.sentence_text: The 32-year-old's statement comes after Indian football's uncertain future on the domestic front.

sentences.title: Sandesh Jhingan Hopes Lionel Messi’s GOAT Tour Sparks Discussions Around India's Domestic Structure
sentences.sentence_text: There remains little clarity whether the Indian Super League will be held or not

sentences.title: Turn Of Fortune! Kuldeep Yadav Shares Screen Space With Lionel Messi On GOAT Tour
sentences.sentence_text: Team India star spinner, Kuldeep, linked up with the eight-time Ballon d'Or winner for a shoot of a promotional video for a sporting super brand during the Argentine's India tour.

sentences.title: Luis Suarez to play another season with Inter Miami alongside Lionel Messi
sentences.sentence_text: Luis Suarez who will turn 39 in January, signed a contract to play the 2026 season with the reigning MLS champions, Inter Miami announced Wednesday | Football News

sentences.title: Lionel Messi Says ‘Jai Mata Di’ During Vantara Aarti, Internet Flooded With Hilarious Memes Over Viral Havan Moment
sentences.sentence_text: Lionel Messi stunned the internet after joining a traditional Aarti at Vantara, Jamnagar, chanting “Jai Mata Di.” Hosted by Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant, the spiritual moment went viral, triggering a wave of humorous memes and cultural crossover reactions online.

sentences.title: Luis Suárez Joins Messi Again at Inter Miami for 2026 Season
sentences.sentence_text: Luis Suárez will continue his football career at Inter Miami, alongside Lionel Messi, for the 2026 season.

sentences.title: Luis Suárez Joins Messi Again at Inter Miami for 2026 Season
sentences.sentence_text: The veteran striker has signed a new contract, marking his third season with the MLS team.

sentences.title: Luis Suárez Joins Messi Again at Inter Miami for 2026 Season
sentences.sentence_text: He scored prominently for the club and assisted in securing its first Supporters' Shield title.
